plot: Five girlfriends, all of them urban professionals, meet in a conference room to share their secrets about life, love, work, and more.
plot_en: Five girlfriends, all of them urban professionals, meet in a conference room to share their secrets about life, love, work, and more.
plot_es: Five girlfriends, all of them urban professionals, meet in a conference room to share their secrets about life, love, work, and more.
title: The Broadroom
